commitResults.messageTitle: Rename chatbot name from Duke to Paradox and update related references; Complete Level-0 tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Implement an initial skeletal version of the chatbot Paradox that simply greets the user and exits.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement echo functionality for user input and improve welcome/exit messages
commitResults.messageBody: exit the program only when user type "bye"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add task list functionality with add and list commands
Add Task and TaskList classes; implement mark and unmark commands for tasks
Add support for todo, deadline, and event tasks with corresponding classes and command handling
Update UI output formatting and input handling; add sample input and expected output files
commitResults.messageBody: Test using the I/O redirection technique

commitResults.messageTitle: Add custom exception handling for task commands; improve error messages and input validation
Add delete command for tasks; update TaskList to use ArrayList and support task removal
Refactor: move files into packages for better project structure
Feature: add persistent storage for tasks; implement file write in TaskList after changes are made and support loading tasks on startup
Feature: add persistent storage for tasks
Refactor: extract task list file R/W operations to TaskListStorage; update TaskList to use new storage class and simplify logic
